title: Hattie in the Attic
description: Hattie has her summer with her girlfriends all planned out until her mother informs her that she will be leaving for two weeks to visit Grandma Nettie. Begrudgingly, Hattie visits her grandma, only to have the unexpected happen when she sneaks up to the attic and places a magical hat upon her head. Hattie in the Attic is the charming story of how this curious girl's vacation becomes an unforgettable experience. The book can also be used to teach students how to make inference and draw conclusion and to identify and use multiple-meaning words.
highFrequencyWords: annual, attic, bandanna, chaps, clutched, diary, proof, prowling, skidded
